title: I need some expert opinion please
body:
My current computer cant handle league anymore , idk if something broke or if the last update was too much , i would like someone to tell me what they think about this computer specs ( im sorry it in french )

CARTE MAITRESSE MSI H81-M/E33
PROCESSEUR INTEL CELERON G1840 2.8GHZ
MÉMOIRE 8GB DDR3-1600
DISQUE DUR SSD KINGSTON 240GB
GRAVEUR LG CD/DVD/RW DL
CARTE DE SON INTÉGRÉ
CARTE RÉSEAU INTÉGRÉ
CARTE VIDÉO INTÉGRÉ
WINDOWS 10 PRO. 64BIT FR. 

i dont know anything about computer , my current pc specs (those i could find) are :

processeur  intel(r) core(tm)2 CPU Q8200 @ 2.33 GHZ
ram  6GB
64bit
Windows 8
240GB

im not sure about how to find the others specs .

Can someone tell me if the first computer is better than the other , and if it would be a good enough setup for someone who only play league and browser games , i dont plan on playing skyrim or bf1 anytime soon . Thanks for taking the time to read and sorry if it a bad thing that i posted it here , i wasnt sure who to ask .

replies.body: If you're on the updated client, what happens if you toggle low performance mode?  Are you having issues only on the client or while in-game too?  What kind of issues are they?  Also, check out our [recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to compare your current setup and to see if any hardware changes might be needed.  Let me know.

i tried to compare but i dont even know the base about all of those specs , when im on the client , everything is a lot slower than before and when im in game , max or minimum setting doesnt change anything , my fps and ms doesnt change much , but every single one of my action are delay by about a seconde ( it wasnt happening before) and sometime my champion stop and i cant move or use skill , but the game is still going normally.

Don't worry, we can help with that!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so our tech team can help you individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which can obtain some logs that gives more context on your pc specs.  This will help us figure out some options best for you.  We'll get back to you!
ok so i downloaded the program , started it , then i send a ticket with the zip file attached to it, is that all or is there others thing i should do?
That's perfect!  Attach that zip and submit your ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!  That's it.  :D
so i download it , play a game and it should review if there is a problem?
By the way im sorry if some sentence i say doesnt make sense , im french.
